application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Sparse Precision Matrix Estimation with Calibration

affiliation.orgName: Department of Operations Research and Financial Engineering
Department of Operations Research and Financial Engineering

analytic.title: Sparse Precision Matrix Estimation with Calibration

abstract.p: We propose a semiparametric method for estimating sparse precision matrix of high dimensional elliptical distribution. The proposed method calibrates regular-izations when estimating each column of the precision matrix. Thus it not only is asymptotically tuning free, but also achieves an improved finite sample performance. Theoretically, we prove that the proposed method achieves the para-metric rates of convergence in both parameter estimation and model selection. We present numerical results on both simulated and real datasets to support our theory and illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed estimator.
